title: ABCI
body: ABCI is the Application BlockChain Interface that provides a clean interface between a state transition machine on one computer and the mechanics of its replication across multiple computers.

title: Atom
body: The Atom is the staking token for the Cosmos Hub. The best analogy is that an Atom is like a virtualised ASIC miner.

title: BFT
body: BFT or Byzantine Fault-Tolerance is the ability to tolerate machines failing in arbitrary ways, including becoming malicious.

title: Blockchain
body: A blockchain, originally block chain, is a continuously growing list of records, called blocks, which are linked and secured using cryptography.

title: Cosmos Hub
body: The Cosmos Hub is the multi-asset ledger that enforces invariants and maintain the security between connected zones.

title: Cosmos Network
body: The Cosmos Network is a network of blockchains that exchange value with each other via a protocol called IBC

title: Cosmos UI
body: The Cosmos UI is the graphical interface for end users to interract with the Cosmos Network

title: Delegator
body: Delegators are Atom holders that contribute to the security of the network by choosing secure and highly available validators through the process of delegation.

title: The Discrete Logarithm Problem
body: This discrete logarithm problem assumes that it is difficult to factor a large integer composed of two or more large prime factors.
